cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.text: We use cookies to personalize your experience. We share insights with our social media, advertising and analytics partners.

content.title: Terms and Conditions
content.content:
1. General Provisions

The General Terms and Conditions below (the “Terms and Conditions“) apply to all persons registered in the BR Club Loyalty Programme (individually referred to as a “Member” and a “Loyalty Programme” and exclusively govern the contractual relationship between the Member and SARL SPA DEVELOPPEMENT, located in Paris – 75017, 10 AVENUE DE LA GRANDE ARMEE, SIREN 493 766 083, (hereinafter “SPA DEVELOPPEMENT”) and all BE RELAX stores participating in the BR Club Loyalty Programme.

SPA DEVELOPPEMENT reserves the right at any time and unilaterally to amend the Terms and Conditions without having to inform each Member individually and without these amendments giving entitlement to allowances for the Member.

All amendments to the Terms and Conditions will be published on the BE RELAX website (www.berelax.com) (the “Website“). The Member undertakes to regularly consult the Terms and Conditions on the Website. The use of the BR Club Loyalty Programme by the Member, after an amendment to the Terms and Conditions has been published on the Website, will constitute acceptance by the Member of the amended Terms and Conditions. A Member rejecting the amendments to the Terms and Conditions must notify the company SPA DEVELOPPEMENT by registered letter. This letter will terminate the Member’s membership in the BR Club Loyalty Programme.

2. Membership

The mere fact of joining the Loyalty Programme entails the full and unreserved acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. To join the BR Club Loyalty Programme free of charge, the individual Customer, a natural person of legal age, must: – Directly at the checkout, complete the electronic form available upon purchase at the various BE RELAX stores in different countries (defined in Article 3.1 of these Terms and Conditions). Personalised membership will then be available to the Customer at the end of the registration process. It is active on the day of registration.

  • Registration will be activated the same day.
  • No registration for this programme by mail or telephone will be considered.
  • Membership is strictly personal and non-transferable. The personal data requested, namely the surname, first name and email address, are mandatory.
  • The Member guarantees the accuracy of all the information indicated on the membership application form.
  • Membership is open to legal persons and to owners, self-employed persons or temporary or full-time employees in the “BE RELAX” shops of SPA DEVELOPPEMENT.
  • SPA DEVELOPPEMENT reserves the right to refuse membership to the BR Club Loyalty Programme to a Member without having to justify its decision.

3. Benefits and use of the BR Club Loyalty Programme

3.1 BENEFITS OF THE BR CLUB LOYALTY PROGRAMME

There are various benefits to joining the BR Club Loyalty Programme, which can include free services depending on the customer’s purchases, exclusive offers on BE RELAX products, and discounts at our partners. Members will be informed exclusively about our new offers via the website www.berelax.com, mobile app and newsletters. All the BR Club benefits are valid only in the Be Relax stores located at the following airports: Paris CDG, London LHR, Frankfurt FRA, Rome FCO, Dubai DBX, Baltimore BWI, New York JFK, Boston BOS, Detroit DTW, Washington Dulles IAD, San Diego SAN, Los Angeles LAX and Toronto YYZ. The list of stores is non-exhaustive.

  • Registration will be activated the same day.
  • No registration for this programme by mail or telephone will be considered.
  • Membership is strictly personal and non-transferable. The personal data requested, namely the surname, first name and email address, are mandatory.
  • The Member guarantees the accuracy of all the information indicated on the membership application form.
  • Membership is open to legal persons and to owners, self-employed persons or temporary or full-time employees in the “BE RELAX” shops of SPA DEVELOPPEMENT.
  • SPA DEVELOPPEMENT reserves the right to refuse membership to the BR Club Loyalty Programme to a Member without having to justify its decision.

3.2 USING THE BR CLUB LOYALTY PROGRAMME

There are various benefits to joining the BR Club Loyalty Programme, which can include free services depending on the customer’s purchases, exclusive offers on BE RELAX products, and discounts at our partners. Members will be informed exclusively about our new offers via the website www.berelax.com, mobile app and newsletters. All the BR Club benefits are valid only in the Be Relax stores located at the following airports: Paris CDG, London LHR, Frankfurt FRA, Rome FCO, Dubai DBX, Baltimore BWI, New York JFK, Boston BOS, Detroit DTW, Washington Dulles IAD, San Diego SAN, Los Angeles LAX and Toronto YYZ. The list of stores is non-exhaustive.

  • Registration will be activated the same day.
  • No registration for this programme by mail or telephone will be considered.

This QR code will enable the Member to then go to the various points of sale forming part of the Loyalty Programme referred to in Article 3.1 of these Terms and Conditions, in order to benefit from the loyalty points. BE RELAX shop purchases made by the Member without mentioning to the personnel their membership of the Loyalty Programme at the time of the purchase shall not grant entitlement to loyalty points and shall not be registered on the Member’s profile.

The calculation and the accumulation of the points are linked by the amount of the transaction carried out by the Customer. The BR Club programme operates independently of the former card-based loyalty programme. The latter is still accepted in the store provided that it is already initiated by a sticker representing a previous visit to a store. It can always be filled in incrementally during each store visit in order to earn the offers to be awarded for the 5th visit (5% discount) and the 10th visit (Be Up 10 or Express Manicure offered) as stipulated in its operation.

Today, the two programmes can be mutually combined (e.g. a customer who has previously joined the loyalty cards can at any time join the new BR Club programme at the checkout or on the app while continuing to use his old loyalty card; he will continue to accumulate stickers on the loyalty card and he will also be able to accumulate points on his BR Club account automatically at each checkout). On the other hand, visits already accumulated in stickers on the loyalty card before joining the new BR Club programme, will never be transformed into points. The points award system is calculated based on the amount of purchases made. For more information on how the points award system works, please refer to the mobile website www.berelax.com.
